about_the_game:
[Worldview]

In the near future, conflicts arise across the globe as factions compete for power and resources.

Noah Technologies has developed a powerful, adaptable tactical exoskeleton known as [E.T.E] and constructed a massive ring-shaped orbital base called [Sky Vault], equipped with superweapons, to monopolize the world's resources.

The skies are shrouded by vast steel structures, darkness looms, and despair spreads.

In response, humanity's major factions united to launch a counterattack against Noah Technologies, a war that nearly annihilated the Earth's surface ecology. Following this, the factions jointly developed new combat mechs, [E.T.E], and formed the "Human Alliance," entering a stalemate with Noah Technologies.

Somewhere in this fractured world, a combat organization under the "Human Alliance," known as the Ninth Accord, awaits the arrival of a guest...

As [The Executor], your arrival will be a beacon of hope for the E.T.E girls, illuminating the endless dark night of this post-apocalyptic wasteland.

[Immersive 3D Mecha Combat: Experience Thrilling, Free-Form Battles]

Breaking free from the traditional stationary combat mechanics, the game employs dynamic spatial movement for engaging battles. Players command a four-member squad in wide, open environments, seamlessly switching between roles and utilizing diverse combat strategies to control the battlefield. Land, sea, and air combat environments significantly impact squad movement patterns and combat behavior. Combined with varied mech skills and ultimate abilities, you’ll experience the grandeur of the battlefield and the intensity of combat like never before!

[Heavy-Industry Mech Designs: A Metal Frenzy with Precision and Realism]

The game's mechs are inspired by classic land, sea, and air equipment, featuring derivative designs. Every battle showcases exquisitely detailed 3D mechs rendered with precision. Real-time high-quality rendering ensures that the battle visuals and mech illustrations remain cohesive. Additionally, the mech development and advanced transformation systems cater to hardcore mech enthusiasts, offering unmatched depth and satisfaction.

[Hardcore Mechs x Beautiful Girls: Crafting an Epic Tale of Resistance]

Amid the chaotic future, where factions vie for dominance and outer-space technologies disrupt the balance, humanoid combat weapons known as E.T.A. emerged. The game combines realistic and fantastical elements, centering on beautiful girls and hardcore mechs. Together, they fight alongside you for their beliefs, composing an epic anthem of defiance against despair in the end times.

[Exquisite Character Models & Top Voice Actor Performances]

The game's character models are crafted with meticulous attention to detail, maintaining full 3D lifelike appearances during battles and interactive development moments. With over 20 characters, each featuring unique designs and personalities, there’s always someone to capture your heart. Additionally, renowned voice actors such as Sakura Tange, Kana Hanazawa, Rie Tanaka, Mikako Komatsu, Zhang Qi, Tao Dian, Gui Niang, and Xie Ying deliver exceptional performances. Their voices adapt to changes in the girls' environment and emotional states, adding vibrancy and depth to their characters.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some scenes and pictures in which the characters are wearing revealing clothing. Players are advised to choose carefully.

name: E.T.E

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: win7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 or faster processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated/independent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: soundblaster
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: win7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 or faster processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated/independent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: soundblaster

short_description: "E.T.E" is an anime-style mecha battle game. The game features different battle scenarios across land, sea, and air. It also features captivating performances by renowned voice actors such as Sakura Tange, Kana Hanazawa, and Rie Tanaka.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
